audioText: Le sage soldat continuera son histoire digne demain pendant notre rendez-vous.
question: Le ______ soldat continuera son histoire digne demain pendant notre rendez-vous.
explanation: The text states 'Le sage soldat continuera son histoire digne demain pendant notre rendez-vous' - The wise soldier will continue his worthy story tomorrow during our appointment. 'Sage' means wise, 'digne' means worthy, and 'rendez-vous' means appointment.
